name: Name:
favoriteFoodValue: Anything I get from my owner
welcome: My name is Zénó, and I’m a friendly and playful Spaniel mix from Budapest. I spend most of my days playing, sleeping, and searching for tasty treats.
title: Write to Zénó!
privacyContent: Any personal data you provide (e.g. via the contact form) is used solely for communication purposes. Your data is not shared with third parties and is only stored as long as necessary.
copyrightContent: The text and image content on this website, including photos, graphics, logos, and other materials, are the exclusive property of the website owner and protected by copyright. Reproduction, distribution, modification, or any form of use of the content without prior written permission from the owner is prohibited.
cookiesContent: This website only uses technical cookies, such as remembering the selected language. These cookies do not collect personal data and do not require consent.
